title: Sea witch Nami splash art

embed.description: My entry for the League of Legends Illustration contest. I went and made a splash art for the sea witch nami skin, which I created earlier. Check out my blog for a WIP and details: terdt.blogspot.d...

body:
So I've seen this fan art for nami. It seems to have been inspired by Ursula from the Little Mermaid. I think Riot should design this skin. Looks awesome and creative! 

Here's another link to how the skin looks like
http://erodonut.deviantart.com/art/Sea-Witch-Nami-392423264

replies.body: Yes. Yes. YES.

As a Nami player:
DO WANT!
Can you add me on League of legends Riot KateyKhaos? I'm a support main too!!!
After throwing money at Riot for so long, how does it feel to have Riot throw money (optimistically speaking) at you Nacho?
I didn't design the skin. Someone else did. I just saw the artwork and was mesmerized by it. I'm just here as an advocate to help bring  out this creative imagination into reality.
Excuse me but what programs did you use to create this? And how long did it take for you to get good enough to make a piece like this?

http://terdt.blogspot.de/2014/12/league-of-legends-sea-witch-nami-splash.html

Here's the actual link if you wanna know more.

You are asking the wrong person. I pasted a link above the splash art picture. The actual artist is someone else. If you would like to ask those kinds of question, click on the link provided and ask the artist him/herself. I just happened to see the amazing artwork and posted it on the board so it receives exposure and recognition.

> Yes. Yes. YES.

Moonstones, I posted this on Reddit after stumbling upon it and it’s gotten a lot of new upvotes on the forums and attention. This skin is amazing, is it being consider in the future at all ?
Please for the love of everything share it with all of the riot design team, and while were at it, have this person fill out an application for a job. "Riot nachocheeseeeee" Sounds good to me.
Lol by Nacho didn't make the skin
Haha, yes.
This skin concept for nami has been around for a while (the splash is new), and it's been my favourite ever since ^^

Way ahead of ya
ye
Wow, this is beautiful. I'm setting this as my wallpaper.
So flattered to have a rioters comment on my post.

It's well done, but the tentacles don't really work with her model and who knows what would happen with the poly count.

If riot does this, it'd require a new model, animations, etc so I don't think it'd happen unless it were one of the really expensive skins; at least a legendary if not ultimate.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hBWHx2R6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-22T06:34:54.718+0000)
>
> It's well done, but the tentacles don't really work with her model and who knows what would happen with the poly count.
> 
> If riot does this, it'd require a new model, animations, etc so I don't think it'd happen unless it were one of the really expensive skins; at least a legendary if not ultimate.

Pretty much this, but, that said...

I'd buy it...

Ultimate is way overestimating the complexity of this skin. This would likely be a 1350 or Legendary at MOST. The biggest change aside from the darker particles they'd make for her would be the tentacles and their animations, and luckily they developed the proper tech for that with Vel'Koz. Other than that, small model and texture changes here and there and bam. Nothing too unnecessarily complicated (relatively speaking).

1.  Extreme model changes
2.  Map changes + new textures
3.  New animations (these will take time and you can't import from Vekkers)
4.  New particles

Based on [this](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3328361) it seems like a legendary skin would be the baseline in terms of cost.

Like I said, it would only really need the octopus tentacles in terms of large model and animation changes. Everything else would only need to be texture changes, particle changes, and small model changes. 

IF it completely replaced all of her animations (and not just her movement as it likely would), THEN I could see Legendary being the minimum. She doesn't need all new animations, just maybe a new run (swim?) cycle.

It would still be legendary, no matter if it's only a part, a change is a change.

Marauder Ashe didn't even get black arrow, because 750 RP skins just don't get particle changes. even though it is only a colour shift. (takes maybe two minutes to do, five if you are thorough.)

alternative title : Deep Terror Nami

( to match the thresh idea )
After seeing this idea, I thought of different possible Nami skins. Maybe a seahorse nami, jellyfish nami, and lionfish nami?

My body is ready for more tentacles.

Vel'Koz and Zyra would not be enough anymore.

I main Nami and have seen this floating around the internet as well! I would looooooove this skin. I'd throw all of my money at it in fact. I realize it could be difficult to animate and have thought about it a lot. Perhaps the tentacles could just flow behind her in the same way her tail does? I know that wouldn't be technically "right" but I think it would be the easiest way to animate it. Anywho, thank you for the post!
